thread.title: Azzurium

title: Azzurium
text:
Only registered TrekEarth members may write critiques. Photographer's Note 
Here another architecture photo. This is a façade of the Azzurium Building located at Benjamin Lins Street next to Crystal Mall . It is a corporate building with 5 floors plus two floors of garage in the underground. Placed in Batel neighborhood the most nobel area of Curitiba the building has a total area of 2,800 m². Each floor have 430 to 600 m² and a median rent price of 120,000 US dollar per year. information took from TopImoveis website . For LARGE VERSION, click HERE 
Nobody has marked this note useful
